tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE GreenBuildingPerformanceData (
  building_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_id INT,
  system_type VARCHAR(50),
  performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
  performance_value DECIMAL(10,2),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    measurement_date DATE,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(50),
    performance_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE EnergySystems (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(255),
    building_name VARCHAR(255),
    capacity DECIMAL,
    efficiency DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    date DATE,
    power_output DECIMAL,
    energy_consumed DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergySystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE MonitoringLogs (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    message TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES EnergySystems(id)
);

CREATE TABLE GreenBuilding (building_id INT PRIMARY KEY, building_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), energy_system VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE EnergySystem (system_id INT PRIMARY KEY, system_name VARCHAR(255), system_type VARCHAR(255), efficiency DECIMAL(5,2))

CREATE TABLE PerformanceData (data_id INT PRIMARY KEY, system_id INT, date TIMESTAMP, energy_generated DECIMAL(10,2), energy_consumed DECIMAL(10,2))

CREATE TABLE MonitoringStation (station_id INT PRIMARY KEY, station_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255))

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLog (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, system_id INT, date TIMESTAMP, issue_description TEXT, resolution_description TEXT)
